alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:13PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sublette County through 100 PM MDT... At 1212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merna, or 24 miles northwest of Pinedale, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Riverton.

area.areaDesc: Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
